author: otaviolima
title: DeFi Dashboard Trackr DEX Portfolio
description: Investors in Decentralized Finance (DeFi) find it difficult to track & manage their investment portfolio in an automated way on many Decentralized Exchanges DEXs, tokens pairs, pools and yield farms.

f6_assessments.q0:
Almost everyone that dipped their toes into DeFi can agree that the general DeFi ecospace can be rather confusing and overwhelming with the amount of opportunities and fast paced nature of DeFi. This proposal wants to reduce the complexity the average user can experience when interacting with DeFi and general investments in the crypto ecospace. The proposers have identified an area that is in dire need of improvement, and the proposal is impactful in that regard. 
One thing that is not entirely clear after reading the proposal is how strong of a coupling the DEX Trackr will have to Cardano. Will this solution be exclusive to Cardano or do you intend to expand this solution to multiple blockchains from the start, or even down the road?
Either way, the solution aligns very well with the Dapp challenge setting and overall the solution is regarded highly impactful. They will receive 5 points in terms of impact.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposers provide a long list of relevant experience which can be further verified from their LinkedIn profiles, this makes them very credible. The detailed plan is split up in monthly increments which clearly outlines what tasks are to be performed in each increment. The whole project is estimated to consume 6 months of work before launch. Estimates are very hard but the proposers are experienced and the plan is rigorous, so the conclusion is that it is feasible in this regard. Furthermore, the budget is clearly outlined with a monthly wage, this strengthens their claim of the 49,500 USD budget. The rates are very reasonable as well. As a conclusion, the feasibility of this project should be regarded very high given the proposers experience and rigorous plan. They will receive the highest score, 5 points.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposing team has presented a great set of KPIs and metrics to measure the success of the project. They are relevant to their DEX tracker and can be used to fully evaluate the success of the proposal. Furthermore, there is a clear definition of success with multiple aspects. And lastly they also state that they will provide monthly updates to the community. All in all, this is an excellent example of how a project's auditability section should be defined and it should be used as an example or standard in the future. The information is in a compact format, yet provides everything that the community requires in order to properly assess the proposal. The score will be the highest possible, 5 points. Good job!

f6_assessments.q0: The project brings convenience to users. It creates a Platform to track and manage the DeFi (Decentralized Finance) investment portfolio of users, in an automated and connected way in many DEXs, token pairs, pools & yield farms on Cardano blockchain. Users only need to connect a web3 wallet or enter a wallet address. This will gradually replace the daily manual checking method, giving users a better experience, saving time and effort.
f6_assessments.q1:
Your team consists of 3 members, based on the information provided, they have full knowledge, experience and skills to implement the project. They are all good people, proof of this is that they have successfully developed the largest media coverage platform Cardanofeed.com and also the largest "Cardano Ecosystem" project directory. A link to their Linkedin profile is also provided, making the team information more transparent. However, this is a 6 month project, there will be a lot of work to be done, having more than 3 members will make the job a lot easier.
Detailed roadmap (6 months) has been provided. The budget allocation is calculated based on the number of months worked and the amount for each month. However, I think you should split the budget further. For example: clearly define the number of working hours, the number of people involved in the work, the amount per hour, etc. That will make the budget more transparent. In addition, you have also done a great job in identifying success metrics. Based on those specific metrics, people can track the progress of the project.
f6_assessments.q2:
I have read the information you provided. The information is complete, people can rely on it to evaluate this project. Conceptually, this project has a very good idea, it saves users time and effort by creating a platform to track and manage the DeFi investment portfolio of users, in an automated and connected way in many DEXs, token pairs, pools & yield farms on Cardano blockchain. However, it would be great if you provide more pictures of the interface of the website, it will make it easier for people to visualize, easier to evaluate.
But that's okay, I fully trust this project will be done successfully. If so, it will certainly bring great value to users, and more broadly, to the Cardano ecosystem. Thank you!

f6_assessments.q0: This is a well-defined issue that investors in the decentralized finance (Defi) sector have difficulty tracking and managing their portfolios is a problem to address at this challenge. This problem can scale up the challenge. A well-defined platform solution for tracking and managing users' Defi portfolios, in an automated and connected way across multiple DEXs, token pairs, pools, and yield farms on the blockchain Cardano. This solution can solve the problem of the challenge. The author has confidently stated that this project will have no difficulty for them as they have verified the interest of users in tracking and managing their Defi investments in an automated way, Eliminating the use of excel spreadsheets. This is a good proposal I hope success will come to them.
f6_assessments.q1: Timeline to implement this project in the span of 6 months. The author has provided a complete blueprint with clear timelines. List in detail what the to-dos for the month are and also aim to achieve them within a certain period of time. The progress of the project is also easily trackable through the web links that the author has listed. The success is clearly described by the author as the results achieved are: information generated in real time for website users, amount of shares on social networks, number of websites and project stores with applications. , shares on specialized media sites, feedback validation, and platform improvements. This success is linked first to the challenge of the campaigns. The solution of this proposal is to create a platform that will track and manage all DeFi investments in a simple way, just connect a Web3 wallet (Nami, Flint ...) or just enter your address wallet. Key KPIs will be monitored by DeFi investors, using various visual elements for investment management. These solutions can address the current challenge of the team.
f6_assessments.q2:
KPIs are clearly defined, the proposed future implementation plan is very detailed and complete. Performance metrics are complete and clear.
The author will provide the community with some kind of progress report as the author goes along, in the form of a monthly news release on the Cardano Feed, to measure the progress of the project proposal.
The author will also provide a board to be disseminated in the Cardano Feed, with the development of the project according to the Catalyst KPIs.
Number of visits to the website: 50,000
Subscribers: 10,000
Number of registered users: 100
Number of connected Web3 wallets: 3,000
Portfolio value tracking number: 5 million
Number of DEXs tracked: 5+
With the above indicators show that this is a good project with adequate performance evaluation and measurement indicators.
Our team consists of developers, UX/UI, Marketing, SEO, Marketing, Business. The team consists of 3 main members working on this project the author seems very experienced and has a strong background: Otávio Lima is Founder & CEO at Cardano Feed, Felipe Barcelos is a Software Engineer and the full stack, Lucas Fernandes is a marketing assistant. The author also outlines what each member of the team has done, they talk about their previous experiences. They also link attached network links so we can easily follow their projects easily. The funding for this proposal is $49,500 less than 20% of the full challenge budget. The budget is broken down into reasonable expenditures, with the amounts listed for each item of the roadmap I think this is a good enough budget to audit the progress of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem is that the difficulty in tracking and managing portfolios in the decentralized financial sector (Defi), the idea is in line with the challenge. The proposed solution is to build a platform to track and manage Defi portfolios. The app is connected to multiple DEX, token pairs, groups, and productivity farms across the Cardano blockchain. The solution given has a good impact on users and investors, we need such an application. Too much work affects memory, we won't be able to keep track of our private oil payments regularly, the proposal that solved this problem helps us. The proposal to create a simple, easy-to-use platform that can manage all Defi investments when connecting Wed3 wallets (Nami, Flint etc.), is really great, imagine you're sitting down for coffee or doing something while still being able to keep track of your assets investing. This will bring the best returns to users and investors. The proposed solution is in line with the development of the Cardano ecosystem, investors participate in using the application, they are assured of the investment and ADA transactions will increase on DEX. Increasing the number of users is also an opportunity to introduce Cardano to them, which helps investors get ready for the best solutions that are to invest in ADA and join the Cardano ecosystem. The author argues that there will be no difficulty when implementing, we see there have been positives in marketing to attract users when doing the first month for free, the application is widely introduced. The marketing has minimized the risk of not reaching the desired number of users using the app. We have an opinion on some risks such as: The security of the application when we connect the wallet to the application, to minimize this the author needs to build a good security system of the application. The second is the risk of the application being able to provide delayed information to users due to network latency, we need to calculate the latency between connections using the methods "End to End" or "Peer to peer" to have a method to minimize this risk. We look forward to the author having an effective method of minimizing the two risks we present.
I rated: 4
f6_assessments.q1:
The plan fully implements the content of the work to be solved, there are specific timelines completed. After being funded, in the first month of creating the wed page string frame, adaptive adjustments in Wireframe established the basic structure of the wed page. Visual design is that UI/UX construction research is also conducted. Front-end and back-end programming is done in the 5th month. The content of the plan is logical with the implementation solution of the proposal. We also see that communication and marketing to users helps the application get more users when completed. As stated above, we have not yet seen the plan to build security for wed, and the plan to develop an internet connection, we look forward to the author adding this part. We agree that the author's plan can be implemented in 6 months. The proposal identifies the three main members who implement the plan, have clear information about their abilities and abilities, and information provided on LinkedIn. Team members are assigned specific tasks to implement the plan, in addition to 7 additional collaborators supporting the implementation of the proposal. The recommended amount of $49,500 is less than 10% of the funding for the F9 challenge. The amount of money spent is clear for each item, we determine the recommended amount being spent in accordance with the stated plan.

Recommended kpis/KPIs are in line with the implementation plan and solution: Number of visits to the website: 50,000, Number of subscribers: 10,000, Number of registered users: 100, Number of connected Web3 wallets: 3,000, Portfolio value tracking volume: 5 million, The number of DEX tracked: 5 or more. I rated: 5

f6_assessments.q0: First, let me start by saying that I like the idea behind the app, the proposal is very good and fits perfectly with the goal of the challenge. According to the proponent, investors in the decentralized finance sector have difficulty tracking and managing their portfolios. This proposal wants to reduce the complexity that users can go through when interacting with Defi and general investments in the crypto eco-space. The solution is to provide a platform to track and manage users' Defi portfolios, in an automated and connected way across multiple DEXs, token pairs, pools, and on-chain productivity farms. Cardano blocks. The solution fits very well with the Dapp challenge settings and overall in my opinion.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal to offer a program of 6 months, the way the script was presented to us was amazing. We know how long the whole project will take and what to expect each month. Active links are statistically and we know well what to expect in each subsequent month, i.e., our image size. I talk about the process for sure.
Next is the budget, which is also very detailed, asking for the proposed combined budget of $49,500. Investment items also listed in the proposal are very specific. Proposals were transparent about the investment costs for each row. The method group planning program is easy to catch and understand.
Finally, the project team consists of 3 members Otávio Lima, Felipe Barcelos, and Lucas Fernandes based on the information provided, they have all the knowledge, experience, and skills to carry out the project. A link to their Linkedin profile is also provided, making the team more transparent. Because of the above reasons, I think the calculation of this proposal is high
f6_assessments.q2:
The information provided is sufficient to assess the progress and success of the proposal. The ability to check the progress of the project is very good. The provided KPIs are very clear such as:
-Number of visits to the website: 50,000
-Number of subscribers: 10,000
-Number of registered users: 100
-Number of Web3 wallets connected: 3,000...
With the information provided, we know the specific goals to be expected here. The proponent also says that it will provide the community with some kind of progress report as we go along, in the form of a monthly newsletter on the Cardano Feed
The proposal also provides a clear definition of success with multiple dimensions. In my opinion, this proposal has provided the information needed to assess the progress and success of the proposal.

solution: Platform to track and manage the DeFi (Decentralized Finance) investment portfolio of users, in an automated and connected way in many DEXs, token pairs, pools & yield farms on Cardano blockchain.
experience: Our team is composed of developers, UX / UI, Marketing, SEO, Marketing, Business and we developed the largest media coverage platform Cardanofeed.com, with more than 1,000,000 monthly visits and also the largest "Cardano Ecosystem" project directory (approximately 800+ projects).
